      • analyzeFrame

        public Beacon.BeaconAnalysis analyzeFrame(org.opencv.core.Mat img,
                                 org.opencv.core.Mat gray,
                                 ScreenOrientation orientation)
        Analyze the current frame using the selected analysis method
        Parameters:
        img - Image to analyze
        gray - Grayscale image to analyze
        orientation - Screen orientation compensation, given by the android.Sensors class
        Returns:
        Beacon analysis class

      • analyzeFrame

        public Beacon.BeaconAnalysis analyzeFrame(ColorBlobDetector redDetector,
                                 ColorBlobDetector blueDetector,
                                 org.opencv.core.Mat img,
                                 org.opencv.core.Mat gray,
                                 ScreenOrientation orientation)
        Analyze the current frame using the selected analysis method, using custom color blob detectors
        Parameters:
        redDetector - Red color blob detector
        blueDetector - Blue color blob detector
        img - Image to analyze
        gray - Grayscale image to analyze
        orientation - Screen orientation compensation, given by the android.Sensors class
        Returns:
        Beacon analysis class

        Set analysis method
        Parameters:
        method - AnalysisMethod selection

      • setAnalysisBounds

        public void setAnalysisBounds(Rectangle bounds)
        Set a rectangle to contain the analyzed area An orange box will be shown containing the analyzed area Only currently works on the FAST method
        Parameters:
        bounds - Rectangle containing the frame area to analyze

      • resetAnalysisBounds

        public void resetAnalysisBounds(org.opencv.core.Size frameSize)
        Reset analysis bounds to contain the entirety of a frame size
        Parameters:
        frameSize - Frame size

      • setColorToleranceRed

        public void setColorToleranceRed(double tolerance)
        Set color tolerance for red beacon detector
        Parameters:
        tolerance - A color tolerance value from -1 to 1, where 0 is unmodified, 1 is maximum tolerance (more colors detect as red), -1 is minimum (fery vew colors detect as red)

      • setColorToleranceBlue

        public void setColorToleranceBlue(double tolerance)
        Set color tolerance for blue beacon detector
        Parameters:
        tolerance - A color tolerance value from -1 to 1, where 0 is unmodified, 1 is maximum tolerance (more colors detect as blue), -1 is minimum (fery vew colors detect as blue)

      • enableDebug

        public void enableDebug()
        Enable debug displays. Use this only on testing apps, otherwise it might slow your program down a little bit or confuse your custom code

      • disableDebug

        public void disableDebug()
        Disable debug displays (default)
